products.name: Ocean Breeze
products.description: A fresh and invigorating scent that captures the essence of a summer day by the beach. Notes of sea salt, citrus, and tropical flowers.

products.name: Sunset Paradise
products.description: A warm and romantic fragrance with notes of coconut, vanilla, and exotic flowers. Perfect for summer evenings.

products.name: Citrus Garden
products.description: An energizing blend of Mediterranean citrus, featuring bergamot, lemon, and mandarin orange.

products.name: Tropical Nights
products.description: An exotic evening fragrance with notes of jasmine, ylang-ylang, and sweet mango.

products.name: Mediterranean Breeze
products.description: A light and airy scent inspired by the Mediterranean coast, featuring lavender, sea spray, and white musk.
